name: TMGToolbox-1.10 Revision 1
body:
In this update the we now support EMME 4.6.0 and 4.4.5.1. EMME 4.5 is not supported.

Please use TMG_Toolbox.mtbx for EMME 4.4.5.1 and before, and TMG_Toolbox_Python3.mtbx for EMME 4.6.0+.

***Revision 1***
***This revision contains a fix for computing the transit background demand in multiclass road assignments.***

## What's Changed
* Refactored xtmf_network_calculator by @amitsandhel in https://github.com/TravelModellingGroup/TMGToolbox/pull/77
* Python 3 update for Calc407ETR by @JamesVaughan in https://github.com/TravelModellingGroup/TMGToolbox/pull/79
* refactored xtmf_matrix_calculator by @amitsandhel in https://github.com/TravelModellingGroup/TMGToolbox/pull/80
* refactored export_binary_matrix by @amitsandhel in https://github.com/TravelModellingGroup/TMGToolbox/pull/82
* refactored assing_v4_boarding penalty by @amitsandhel in https://github.com/TravelModellingGroup/TMGToolbox/pull/83
* Added the python3 six import libraries from the utilities library by @amitsandhel in https://github.com/TravelModellingGroup/TMGToolbox/pull/84
* removed unneded nested and contextlib imports and fixed minor unicode… by @amitsandhel in https://github.com/TravelModellingGroup/TMGToolbox/pull/85
* refectored CheckScenarioFunction by @amitsandhel in https://github.com/TravelModellingGroup/TMGToolbox/pull/86
* refactored flag Premium Buses by @amitsandhel in https://github.com/TravelModellingGroup/TMGToolbox/pull/87
* refactored check_network_integrity by @amitsandhel in https://github.com/TravelModellingGroup/TMGToolbox/pull/88
* refactored check network connectivity by @amitsandhel in https://github.com/TravelModellingGroup/TMGToolbox/pull/89
* Refactored Link Specific Volumes by @amitsandhel in https://github.com/TravelModellingGroup/TMGToolbox/pull/90
* Refactored mutli_class_road_assignment by @amitsandhel in https://github.com/TravelModellingGroup/TMGToolbox/pull/81
* refactored Add Node Weights by @amitsandhel in https://github.com/TravelModellingGroup/TMGToolbox/pull/91
* Make RemoveExtraNodes XTMF compatible. by @JamesVaughan in https://github.com/TravelModellingGroup/TMGToolbox/pull/92
* Fixed mult-class road assignment by not using the removed nested call. by @JamesVaughan in https://github.com/TravelModellingGroup/TMGToolbox/pull/93
* refactored export network tables by @amitsandhel in https://github.com/TravelModellingGroup/TMGToolbox/pull/94
* refactored exportcountpost results by @amitsandhel in https://github.com/TravelModellingGroup/TMGToolbox/pull/95
* Compressed Matrix Export by @JamesVaughan in https://github.com/TravelModellingGroup/TMGToolbox/pull/96

* Refactored Geo Numbers Nodes by @amitsandhel in https://github.com/TravelModellingGroup/TMGToolbox/pull/110

* added two more toolsrefactored assignment transit tools by @amitsandhel in https://github.com/TravelModellingGroup/TMGToolbox/pull/141

* refactored extract transit od vectors by @amitsandhel in https://github.com/TravelModellingGroup/TMGToolbox/pull/149

* refactored return boarding types by @amitsandhel in https://github.com/TravelModellingGroup/TMGToolbox/pull/155

* deleted analysis/xtmf_network_calculator.py by @wdiogu in https://github.com/TravelModellingGroup/TMGToolbox/pull/157

* refactored v4_fbta by @amitsandhel in https://github.com/TravelModellingGroup/TMGToolbox/pull/168

* refactored check_network_connectivity by @amitsandhel in https://github.com/TravelModellingGroup/TMGToolbox/pull/170
* fixed the emme version error inside the export subarea tool by @amitsandhel in https://github.com/TravelModellingGroup/TMGToolbox/pull/171

* refactored hypernetwork from schema multiclass by @amitsandhel in https://github.com/TravelModellingGroup/TMGToolbox/pull/175
* refactored revenue calculations by @amitsandhel in https://github.com/TravelModellingGroup/TMGToolbox/pull/176
* refactored export subarea tool by @amitsandhel in https://github.com/TravelModellingGroup/TMGToolbox/pull/177
* created new conversion tool convert_ncs16_ncs22 by @amitsandhel in https://github.com/TravelModellingGroup/TMGToolbox/pull/178
* Station Transfers by @JamesVaughan in https://github.com/TravelModellingGroup/TMGToolbox/pull/179
* Fix single class volume per operator by @JamesVaughan in https://github.com/TravelModellingGroup/TMGToolbox/pull/180
* Fix opening CSV writer in Python3 by @JamesVaughan in https://github.com/TravelModellingGroup/TMGToolbox/pull/181
* Additional CSV newline fixes. by @JamesVaughan in https://github.com/TravelModellingGroup/TMGToolbox/pull/182
* Update iteritems for python3. by @JamesVaughan in https://github.com/TravelModellingGroup/TMGToolbox/pull/183
* updated itervalues to python3 by @amitsandhel in https://github.com/TravelModellingGroup/TMGToolbox/pull/184

* Mixed traffic TTF Parameter by @JamesVaughan in https://github.com/TravelModellingGroup/TMGToolbox/pull/186
* Removed deadcodes and fixed issues with door calculations by @wdiogu in https://github.com/TravelModellingGroup/TMGToolbox/pull/187
* added conversion tool to emme gui by @amitsandhel in https://github.com/TravelModellingGroup/TMGToolbox/pull/188
* Fix switching scenarios for export network package. by @JamesVaughan in https://github.com/TravelModellingGroup/TMGToolbox/pull/189
* Fix bad references to six.u to six.text_type. by @JamesVaughan in https://github.com/TravelModellingGroup/TMGToolbox/pull/190
* fixed -ve lfare issues by @wdiogu in https://github.com/TravelModellingGroup/TMGToolbox/pull/191
* Fix for Transit Background. by @JamesVaughan in https://github.com/TravelModellingGroup/TMGToolbox/pull/193

## New Contributors
* @wdiogu made their first contribution in https://github.com/TravelModellingGroup/TMGToolbox/pull/100

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/TravelModellingGroup/TMGToolbox/compare/1.9.0...1.10.1

name: TMGToolbox-1.9
body:
## Primary Changes

* Added compatibility with EMME 4.4.5.
* Improved compatibility for loading NWP files across different versions of EMME.

name: TMGToolbox for XTMF 1.8
body:
This version of the TMG toolbox provides support for EMME up to version 4.4.4.2.

New Features:
* Updated Importing and Exporting of Shapefiles
* Fixed importing of NWP's for EMME 4.4.4.2 from older versions
* Updated Import Binary Matrix to allow for 1D "matrices"
* Updated Copy Transit Lines to be more resilient for edge cases
* Fixed warnings from pandas related code for export network package
* V4_FBTA will now properly set the Walk speed if called from a script
* Allows for the assigning of transfer boarding penalties separate from the initial boarding penalties.
* Export Operator Transfer Matrix now works for multi-class assignments
* Updated Extract Flagged Line Demand to work in a multi-class assignment
* Fixed Modeller interaction with ExportNWP

name: TMGToolbox-1.8 Release Candidate 2
body:
This version of the TMG toolbox provides support for EMME up to version 4.4.4.2.

RC Updates:
* Fixed Modeller interaction with ExportNWP

New Features:
* Updated Importing and Exporting of Shapefiles
* Fixed importing of NWP's for EMME 4.4.4.2 from older versions
* Updated Import Binary Matrix to allow for 1D "matrices"
* Updated Copy Transit Lines to be more resilient for edge cases
* Fixed warnings from pandas related code for export network package
* V4_FBTA will now properly set the Walk speed if called from a script
* Allows for the assigning of transfer boarding penalties separate from the initial boarding penalties.
* Export Operator Transfer Matrix now works for multi-class assignments
* Updated Extract Flagged Line Demand to work in a multi-class assignment

name: TMGToolbox-1.8 Release Candidate 1
body:
This version of the TMG toolbox provides support for EMME up to version 4.4.4.2.

New Features:
* Updated Importing and Exporting of Shapefiles
* Fixed importing of NWP's for EMME 4.4.4.2 from older versions
* Updated Import Binary Matrix to allow for 1D "matrices"
* Updated Copy Transit Lines to be more resilient for edge cases
* Fixed warnings from pandas related code for export network package
* V4_FBTA will now properly set the Walk speed if called from a script
* Allows for the assigning of transfer boarding penalties separate from the initial boarding penalties.
* Export Operator Transfer Matrix now works for multi-class assignments
* Updated Extract Flagged Line Demand to work in a multi-class assignment

name: TMGToolbox for XTMF 1.7
body:
* Improved Surface Transit Speed Updating performance
* Fixed bug loading NWP's with missing extra attribute files
* Improved compatibility with EMME 4.4.2

name: TMGToolbox V1.6.1344
body: This TMGToolbox is compatible with XTMF version 1.6.1344.

name: TMG's XTMF 1.4 RC1
body: This is the TMGToolbox for XTMF 1.4.1259 Release Candidate 1.
